homePopularIndustries_title.title: Popular Industries
homePopularIndustries_title.text_default: Our studio specializes in developing websites for various industries that are popular and in demand in Russia. We understand the importance of having an online presence, so we are happy to help you create an attractive and functional website for your business.
homePopularIndustries_title.text_1:
• Landing pages, Corporate websites, Online stores, catalog development
  • B2B portal development
  • Automated platform for creating and managing personal brands
  • Promo website development
  • Code auditing
  • Native application development
  • Cross-platform application development
  • IT system design
homePopularIndustries_title.text_2:
• Virtual personal trainers with artificial intelligence
  • Platform for sharing healthy recipes and diets
  • Fitness arena with virtual competitions and rewards for achievements
  • App for sleep monitoring and providing recommendations for better sleep
  • Platform for uniting athletes and forming teams for joint workouts
  • Virtual tours of world sports facilities and famous places
  • App for remote group fitness workouts
  • Platform for exchanging experience and advice on proper physical training
  • Interactive activity tracker with the ability to create challenges for oneself and friends
  • Platform for organizing and conducting charitable sports events
homePopularIndustries_title.text_3:
• Loyalty program using QR codes to receive discounts and bonuses
  • Interactive games and contests among customers with prizes like free food
  • Online orders with food customization and the creation of unique ingredient combinations
  • Advertisement videos and content uplifting mood and positively influencing appetite
  • Partnership with courier drivers for fast delivery and promotions
  • Interactive maps with all fast-food locations and information about offers
  • Customer feedback program and involving participants in menu ideas (menu design, format, etc.)
  • Development of custom mobile apps for convenient ordering and payment
  • Unique packaging with gamification elements for increased engagement
  • Promotional events and seasonal offers to attract customers and increase sales
homePopularIndustries_title.text_4:
• Online consultations with doctors and dentists through video communication
  • Platform for scheduling appointments and receiving visit reminders
  • Electronic medical records with access for patients and physicians
  • Health monitoring system for patients with chronic illnesses
  • Virtual tours of clinics and rooms to familiarize with equipment
  • Platform for exchanging experience among medical specialists
  • Interactive educational videos on prevention and treatment of various diseases
  • Development of special applications for treatment compliance monitoring
  • Partnership with fitness centers and dieticians for a comprehensive health approach
  • Platform for organizing online webinars and medical conferences
homePopularIndustries_title.text_5:
• Virtual themed rooms with interesting discussions and events (basically forums)
  • Platform for cultural exchange and language learning with native speakers
  • Interactive games and quizzes for user entertainment
  • Content store with unique content from creative users
  • Collaborative stories and books created collectively by users
  • Development of interactive filters and stickers for use in stories
  • Audio shows and podcasts featuring famous personalities
  • Virtual exhibitions and galleries to showcase artwork by artists
  • Special rankings and awards for user activity and engagement
  • Platform for organizing online meetings and demonstrations
homePopularIndustries_title.text_6:
• Platform for creating and selling unique souvenirs and handmade products
  • Virtual fitting rooms for online clothing and accessory try-ons
  • Customizable gift certificates and gifts with delivery
  • Platform for selling environmentally friendly and sustainable products
  • Interactive catalog with the ability to create fashionable outfits
  • Platform for exchanging and reselling used goods with quality checks
  • Subscriptions for monthly unique products and sets
  • Interactive reviews and video reviews from real customers
  • Marketplace for small manufacturers and artists to promote their products
  • Platform for creating and selling personalized children's products
homePopularIndustries_title.text_7:
• Blog with regular updates on legal information and advice.
  • Webinars and online seminars on relevant legal issues.
  • Partnership with bloggers and journalists to disseminate expert opinions.
  • Platform for online consultations and receiving legal advice.
  • Interactive case studies and successful customer stories with positive outcomes.
  • Virtual courses on the basics of law and legal processes.
  • Compilation of articles and news on important events in the legal field.
  • Platform for hosting and viewing online presentations by lawyers.
  • Partnership with organizations to provide free services to those in need.
  • Online legal document builders to simplify the process.
homePopularIndustries_title.text_8:
• Virtual fitting rooms and product reviews in augmented reality (very cool idea).
  • Platform for buying and selling exclusive and collectible items.
  • Content marketing campaigns involving popular bloggers and influencers.
  • Interactive shopping with the ability to create personal collections.
  • Partnership with fashion designers to create exclusive collections.
  • Price tracking for products and providing personalized discounts.
  • Platform for pre-orders and receiving new products before official release.
  • Virtual shopping tours of stores with different themes.
  • Compilation of stylistic looks and tips on choosing fashionable clothing.
  • Interactive shopping in social media with the ability to directly purchase products.
homePopularIndustries_title.text_9:
• Platform for investing in real estate with low commissions.
  • Virtual financial advisor with personalized recommendations (here also AI).
  • Platform for cryptocurrency exchange using artificial intelligence.
  • Mobile wallets supporting various currencies and contactless payment.
  • Platform for providing microloans using data analytics.
  • Interactive online courses on financial literacy and investing.
  • Platform for automatic budgeting and expense control.
  • Virtual exchange point for instant currency exchange without hidden fees.
  • Financial games and simulators to teach children and teenagers money management.
  • Platform for organizing charitable donations and financial support for those in need.
homePopularIndustries_title.text_10:
• Virtual real estate tours with the ability to view properties from anywhere in the world.
  • Platform for renting and selling commercial real estate for businesses.
  • Interactive online consultations with realtors and the ability to preview properties.
  • Partnership with interior designers to create attractive real estate photos.
  • Market price tracking and providing analytical data for clients.
  • Platform for providing real estate appraisal and insurance services.
  • Virtual real estate cards with detailed information about each property.
  • Partnership with architects and builders to create ready-made housing design projects.
  • Interactive real estate showings using augmented reality.
  • Platform for organizing real estate sales with bidding and auction options.
homePopularIndustries_title.text_11:
• Platform for searching and booking tours with personalized offers.
  • Virtual travels with the ability to choose exotic and unique routes.
  • Partnership with local guides and tour guides to organize unique tours.
  • Interactive maps with detailed information about places and landmarks.
  • Platform for organizing thematic and cultural festivals at tourist sites.
  • Information resources with tips and recommendations for safe travels.
  • Virtual travel guides with personalized route selections for each customer.
  • Partnership with tour companies to provide joint offers.
  • Interactive tours with the opportunity to communicate and meet other travelers.
  • Platform for creating and booking on-demand unique tours.
homePopularIndustries_title.text_12:
• Interactive lessons using virtual and augmented reality.
  • Platform for exchanging knowledge and experience between teachers and students.
  • Courses with practical assignments and online mentoring.
  • Partnership with universities and educational institutions to provide academic programs.
  • Interactive courses on entrepreneurship and business skills.
  • Platform for language learning through virtual conversational groups.
  • Development of professional skills and education using online masterclasses.
  • Partnership with corporations to conduct corporate training programs.
  • Interactive lessons on soft skills development and personal growth.
  • Platform for online education of children and teenagers according to school curriculums.

stagesProject.title: Stages of development of your project

box_1.title: Stage 1
box_1.desc: We study your TOR or help you draw it up. We analyze the group in the middle segment. Determine the target audience of the site.

box_2.title: Stage 2
box_2.desc: Development of the structure and design of the site in online mode. Drawing by designers of adaptive versions of the site. Coordination of the design layout with the customer.

box_3.title: Stage 3
box_3.desc: Design layout layouts with SEO in mind. Adaptation of layout for all platforms. Layout testing. Coordination with the customer.

box_4.title: Stage 4
box_4.desc: Stretch layout on the CMS system. Website programming and functionality creation. setting up and testing the functionality of the site.

box_5.title: Stage 5
box_5.desc: Filling the site with content. Basic SEO site optimization. Site hosting.

box_6.title: Stage 6
box_6.desc: Site support. Launching and maintaining advertising to attract customers.

our-studio.title: How our studio works
our-studio.text:
We select a solution for the client.

We will communicate with you and offer a solution that will give the maximum result in the near future. Not every business is suitable for SEO or needs a multi-page website or web application.

box_1.title: We will not make a bad site
box_1.content: Under the offer: for 7 days for 19900 rubles

box_2.title: We will not sell for you on request
box_2.content: We are building a system, and calling back on request is already on your shoulders

box_3.title: We do not make template sites in 1 day
box_3.content: We create an author's product from scratch for you

box_4.title: If the price is important to you, not the result
box_4.content: You better look for developers elsewhere

box_5.title: We make a product that brings you profit
box_5.content: It should be liked not by you, but by visitors, converting them into leads and sales

box_6.title: We don't need to raise the check because of useless ratings
box_6.content: We do not pursue yellow press awards, but work for the result

footer.description: We have been developing websites for Russia and foreign markets since 2010. Our team consists of more than fifty employees in different countries and cities.

Studio.hello: Hello!!! We are a digital agency of Usertech.
Studio.studio_our_agency:
Full cycle digital agency USERTECH is a Russian IT company, developers from Moscow and St. Petersburg.

Our clients are companies from small and medium-sized businesses, as well as start-up projects from all over the world. Our team adapts to each client and creates comfortable conditions for remote cooperation with the ability to control the project online.

Our top priority is strong and long-term cooperation based on the Win-Win concept.

When developing, the Usertech team uses modern technologies, thanks to which more than 100 successful projects have been implemented, including complex web services: educational platforms, B2B platforms, marketplaces, online auctions, financial platforms, as well as complex corporate sites.

Philosophy

A full-cycle digital agency Usertech business has developed its own philosophy of working with clients during the implementation of web projects. For us, the client is primarily our partner with whom we work together to achieve the goals set for the project. Therefore, we do not just analyze your niche, but literally dive into your business and begin to understand it the way you know it. Only in this case, truly selling sites and high-quality web services, digital platforms that bring real results are obtained.

Our studio implements an open format of work with its clients during the implementation of the project. In real time, our customers see from the first day how our Designers create layouts of future sites and can take part in their creation without restrictions on edits. After laying out the layout, you get access to the site template, where you can already observe the programming, the so-called stretching the site to the content management system. Our task is the success of your business, we never abandon our customers and accompany each project after its completion and launch.

box_1.desc: By ordering a turnkey website from us, you will receive a powerful image and marketing tool. It will boost your sales and easily reach the top.

studio_contact.title: We are a full cycle digital agency

algoritm-job.title: Our Approach to Projects
algoritm-job.p-1:
Can you build a durable house without a project and drawings? Can you estimate the cost of its construction without an estimate? Of course not, you would say. Indeed, unless we're talking about a country cottage, nobody would think of building a house without drawings.

At the same time, clients of mobile and web application development often overlook such an important stage as planning. This leads to conflicts with developers, mismatched expectations, and, as a result, project failure, wasted money, and time.

Let us tell you how we manage to create great mobile and web applications.
algoritm-job.ul-1:
• Working with any order at UserTech starts with the development of a technical specification, which is a mandatory stage. The development of a technical specification takes approximately 100 working hours of the team.
  • In the created technical specification, we provide a cost and timeline calculation for the project and send it for approval. Once the client approves them, we start the development process.
  • The development is usually divided into 3-4 stages, with clear indicators of product readiness. Payments can also be divided into stages.
  • We work according to the Agile methodology with sprint durations of 1 week. Typically, within a week, there is an update of the working version of the product, which our clients can observe in real-time. The creation of the initial working version can take 3-4 sprints from the start.
  • Once the project is developed and delivered, we provide paid technical support and maintenance for an unlimited period of time.
algoritm-job.p-2: Just as you cannot build a good house without a project and drawings, you cannot develop a good application without a detailed description. The project concept (also known as a technical specification or design document in mobile games) is what we start with when working with each client. Without a technical specification, it is impossible to accurately estimate the cost and timeline of the project.
algoritm-job.p-3: A technical specification is a document that provides a detailed description of the future product from different perspectives: conceptual, usability, and use cases. In the created technical specification, our company's specialists often include screen diagrams of the future application, which facilitates understanding.
algoritm-job.h4-2: What tasks does a Technical Specification solve?
algoritm-job.ul-2:
• The technical specification allows for detailed project planning, working out all the nuances that can significantly affect the cost and timeline. These are the aspects that interest the client the most.
  • It synchronizes the understanding of the project between the client and the developer. Often, this understanding can differ significantly and without a well-developed technical specification, it can lead to conflicts.
  • It defines ways to solve complex aspects of the project.
algoritm-job.p-4: Our company provides technical specification development services performed by highly qualified specialists with experience in various fields. They can see optimal solutions where others cannot.
algoritm-job.h4-3: What does a Technical Specification consist of?
algoritm-job.p-5: Each technical specification has its own structure, but in general, the main sections can be outlined as follows:
algoritm-job.ol:
• Project Description: A simple explanation of the product or service being developed, its purpose, and how it works.
  • Component Structure: The components that will be included in the product: backend, frontend, mobile; how they will interact with each other.
  • Technological Stack: The programming languages to be used, technical requirements for the software.
  • Use Cases: Usage scenarios of the application by users. This section may also include screen maps and mock-ups of key screens.
  • Security and Fault Tolerance: How protection against hacking will be implemented, as well as resistance to load and scalability.
algoritm-job.p-6: On average, a technical specification takes 20-40 A4 pages. At the end of it, our company's specialists provide a cost and timeline calculation for project completion.
algoritm-job.h4-4: How is a Technical Specification created?
algoritm-job.p-7:
UserTech assigns a project manager to the client, who engages in dialogue to clarify the details of the desired application and proposes various solutions. If necessary, they may involve more specialized experts in the development of the technical specification, not only from a technical but also from a legal perspective.

The document is prepared in Google Docs, and we immediately provide access to it. This way, the client can monitor the document's preparation in real-time, make corrections or suggestions.
